representation_information.name: OpenDocument Chart Document Format (ODC), Version 1.2. Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.
representation_information.description: An XML-based format for a chart that is editable or dynamically generated from a data source. File extension .odc is used for a free-standing chart. May be embedded within other document formats in the OpenDocument Format (ODF) family. Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
